title: TypeError: '>' not supported between instances of 'NoneType' and 'float' while mining commits
body:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/concurrent/futures/process.py", line 246, in _process_worker
    r = call_item.fn(*call_item.args, **call_item.kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/concurrent/futures/process.py", line 205, in _process_chunk
    return [fn(*args) for args in chunk]
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/concurrent/futures/process.py", line 205, in <listcomp>
    return [fn(*args) for args in chunk]
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/bugbug/repository.py", line 839, in _transform
    return transform(HG, REPO_DIR, commit)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/bugbug/repository.py", line 772, in transform
    set_commit_metrics(
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/bugbug/repository.py", line 638, in set_commit_metrics
    get_space_metrics(commit.metrics, after_metrics["spaces"])
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/bugbug/repository.py", line 626, in get_space_metrics
    get_summary_metrics(obj, space)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/bugbug/repository.py", line 577, in get_summary_metrics
    get_summary_metrics(obj, space)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/bugbug/repository.py", line 467, in get_summary_metrics
    obj["halstead_estimated_program_length_max"] = max(
TypeError: '>' not supported between instances of 'NoneType' and 'float'
```

Probably a regression from #2372.
